name: Metal Music For Posers : C Trivia Game | Music Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who made the song 'Into Everlasting Fire'?
What was the song 'Suicide Solution' about?
questions.explanation:
Bon Scott.

	'Suicide Solution' was about Ozzy's friend Bon Scott (of AC DC if you didn't know, which you should have) who drank himself to death.

questions.text: Which band was not on the 'Heavy Metal 2000' soundtrack?
What was Black Sabbath's original name?
questions.explanation:
Earth & earth.

	Sabbath changed their name when they played a gig at which they were initially thought to be a pop band. They chose 'Black Sabbath' so they wouldn't experience any more mix-ups.

questions.text: Before John Bush joined Anthrax what band did he sing in?
TRUE OR FALSE: James Murphy has played guitar for Death, Testament, Obituary, and Murphy's Law.
Who made a cover of the song 'Physical'?
questions.explanation:
Nine Inch Nails.

	This was track 98 on 'Broken'.

questions.text: What is Ministry best categorized as?
